choices: Working at a Night Shift of a Cafe (Off Campus)
1.content:
Julia Endyke had started her first semester as a college freshman, majoring in education with the goal of becoming a teacher one day. She was taking three courses with the following schedule:

Introduction to Early Childhood - Tuesday & Thursday - 10:00 AM - 11:15 AM
Education and Film - Mon & Wednesday (9:30 AM - 12:30 PM)
Educational Psychology - Online Course

With the minimum number of credits to be considered a full-time student, she had a lot of time on her hand. The first week of the semester covered mainly the logistics of her courses.

It was a Friday night, so she didn't have any classes. What the innocent, naive brunette didn't know was the high crime rate in this town.

Where was she right now?
1.title: The Starting Point

12.content:
On that Friday night, Julia had joined a party that was hosted by a frat house. Arriving at 9:00 PM, she wore a white tube-top which showed off her cleavages, a light-pink skirt, and a pair of sandals. For a couple of hours, guys and gals were chatting, flirting, drinking, and dancing within this large two-floor house.

At 1:00 AM, many had left, and the party was winding down to just a small handful left. Julia was the last girl in the house, and the five remaining guys had persuaded her to play a game called Cards Against Humanity. After being explained the rules, she was dared to make a deal that the lose would have to do what the winner says. In other words, whoever had the least number of cards had to do what the one with the greatest number of cards say.

Naively, the brunette agreed, but unbeknownst to her, one of the guys had spiked her drink. And after taking another sip of her drink, the brunette started to feel sleepy and fatigued. Her speech slurred. Her heartbeat raced. Throughout the game, she struggled to make sense what most of the vocabulary meant.

1:40 AM – Julia had lost.

And the winner said, “Alright Julia, since I won and you lost, you have to do what I say.”

“O-Okay,” the girl said timidly.

What did the winner say?
12.title: The Dare

121.content:
Julia's eyes were half-open as she was feeling too tired to think straight. But suddenly, she felt someone shoving her to the floor, pinning her legs down. Someone came behind and secured her wrists, pulling them over her head and sitting on top of her arms.

“W-What are you doing!?” Julia said nervously.

“Tickle Torture,” said the winner as the guy pinning the brunette’s arms began to scribble over her armpits.

“Ah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!” the girl broke out into laughter, squirming. She felt someone taking off her sandals and began tickling the tender soles of her feet, causing her laughter to grow even louder. “Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! No! He-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Stop! Ah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!”
Her eyes were so fixated on the tickling hands that she only just realized that two of them were holding their cellphones out to record her. “Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! No! He-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! I can’t! He-ha-ha-ha-ha! Take this! Ha-ha-ha-ha!”

“We’ll give you a break if you beg us to take off your tube-top,” said the winner.

It was a preposterous request as Julia wasn’t wearing a bra. But she wasn’t in the right mind right now. “Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Take it off! He-ha-ha-ha-ha Please! He-ha-ha! Take off my top! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!”

The tickling stopped, leaving the brunette panting for air all while someone came around to pulled down her white tube-top, revealing her large breasts and flat midriff. She was sweating a bit, causing her bronze skin to shimmer under the light. But only a minute had gone by until the tickling continued, causing her to scream and laughter, “NO! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!” Her jiggling bosoms were being recorded this time around. And an additional tickler was groping her breasts and tickling her ribs and sides.

“We’ll give you a break if you beg us to take off the rest of your clothes,” said the winner.

Of course, it was only a matter of time until Julia began begging frantically for that freedom of being able to breathe. Her skirt and underwear slid off her legs, leaving her completely nude.

The tickling continued.

The naked freshman was tormented throughout the night until she simply passed out.

Where did she wake up?
121.title: Tickle Torture

info.brief_description: Julia is a college freshman who has a knack for getting into trouble.
info.description: This is an interactive story about Julia Endyke, an eighteen-year old freshman student, who has a knack for getting into trouble.
